EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you from WEX Factoring!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you again for your interest in Fleet One Factoring. Please take a look at the at the rate proposal and let me know if you have any questions or concerns. I will need the following items listed should you decide to move forward for underwriting to begin:
Fees associated:
Flat discount rate $3.00 ACH funding fee $15.00 Wire fee FREE funding to fuel account
· Signed proposal
· Application
· Copy of Operating Authority
· Insurance certificate
· Sample Invoice and backup paperwork used for billing
· Articles of Incorporation/Organization/Partnership
· Copy of Driver’s License
Powerful real-time reporting along with on-line credit checks available 24/7 for no additional charges.
I hope you have a wonderful rest of the day! I look forward to speaking with you soon.
Sincerely,
{!User.Name} Fleet One Factoring, LLC {!User.Title} {!User.Phone} {!User.Email}
